entry.title: Welcome Message
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I am Ju Lin, an undergraduate student and the creator of this personal website. I am thrilled to officially launch my platform and start sharing my experiences, thoughts, and interests with you all.

It is always my dream to own a personal portfolio website with my name as domain. However, I want to let you know that this website is still a work in progress and there may be some areas that are under construction. I appreciate your understanding and patience as I continue to develop and improve my site.

In the meantime, I will be posting updates about my studies, hobbies, and any other projects I am working on. I hope to provide a glimpse into my life and to share my journey with those who are interested.

I am currently doing a undergraduate research about navigation which will be introduced in a conference in mid May, and a powertrain engineer in PolyU E-Formula Team who will attend FSUK in JUly. Needless to mention my course work, I am not having much time to update and maintain this website until the semester ends.

If you have any suggestions or requests for content that you would like to see on my site, please do not hesitate to reach out to me via ju@julin.org. I am always open to feedback and new ideas.

Thank you for visiting my website, and I hope you enjoy everything so far.
